name: Jet Site Unit Could Widgets
author: Jettochkin

sections.description:
en: “Cloud” groups and users of your social network with highly customizable display
You have a lot of communities? Want to show users a maximum of groups? Install this widget!

ru: “Облако” групп и пользователей Вашей социальной сети с широкими возможностями настройки отображения
У Вас множество групп и/или пользователей? Множество блогов (сообществ)? Хотите показать пользователям максимум групп и/или блогов? Установить этот виджет!

Live demo: Sportactions site, VW Club site, JES DEV site

!!! For Buddypress 1.1.x, 1.2.1,2,3,4 : Jet Groups Could and Jet Members Could

Contact

For suggestions, bugs, hugs and love can be donated at the following locations.

Authors page

Plugin page
sections.installation:
1. Upload jet-site-unit-could.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress MU
  3. Add widget to site
  4. Set Title, Count and more options
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • Update code

1.2

  • Added functional plug-Jet Blog Meta List (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/jet-blog-meta-list-2-ru-edition/)
  • Cleaned up code

1.1.5

  • Fix for Widget: not save options “Set on the members could and noindex nofollow on links?”

1.1

  • Small changes in code. Upgrading is not compulsory

1.0

  • First Release.

short_description: Provides random members and/or groups avatar list + blog list with more options /Widget/
